def_en: If someone locks you out of a place, they prevent you entering it by locking the doors.
If you lock yourself out of a place, such as your house, you cannot get in because the door is locked and you do not have your keys.

def_cn: （在劳资纠纷中公司）不准（工人）进入工作场所
def_en: In an industrial dispute, if a company locks its workers out, it closes the factory or office in order to prevent the employees coming to work.
